item.title: Shuttle
item.description: There is a free shuttle to transport students between Luddy Hall and MESH during the academic year when class is in session. Availability: Monday – Friday from 8AM – 5PM Reservation: Call 812-855-5043 at least 10 minutes before a ride. Rides must be scheduled on the same day. Limitations: Starts August 26th and will follow the academic calendar for holidays and breaks. Riders need to be at the pick-up location at the time requested.
